content: Synthesis: A mixture of H2dnpdc (0.10 mmol, 0.033 g), Co(NO3)2 (0.10 mmol, 0.031 g), and bipy (0.10 mmol, 0.016 g) in water/ethyl glycol (8/2 mL) was adjusted to pH = 6.5 with 1 M NaOH aqueous solution and then heated at 160 °C for 4 days in a 23 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. After cooling to room temperature slowly, rod crystals of 1 were collected with a yield of 63% based on H2dnpdc. Elem anal. Calcd for C72H50N12O28Co3: C, 50.63; H, 2.95; N, 9.84. Found: C, 50.84; H, 2.86; N, 9.89. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3074w, 1673m, 1611vs, 1532vs,1485w, 1399vs, 1346m, 1219w, 1006w, 913w, 812m, 707m. A similar procedure was followed to prepare compound 2, except that bipy was replaced by bpea (0.1 mmol, 0.019 g). After the reaction mixture was cooled to room temperature slowly, rod brown crystals of 2 were obtained. The product was always contaminated by uncharacterized phases that were difficult to remove. IR (KBr, cm–1): 3583b, 3073w, 1674m, 1611vs, 1532vs, 1486w, 1400vs, 1346m, 1219w, 1092w, 1066w, 911w, 856w, 813m, 707m.
clean_text:
References

Synthesis: A mixture of H2dnpdc (0.10 mmol, 0.033 g), Co(NO3)2 (0.10 mmol, 0.031 g), and bipy (0.10 mmol, 0.016 g) in water/ethyl glycol (8/2 mL) was adjusted to pH = 6.5 with 1 M NaOH aqueous solution and then heated at 160 °C for 4 days in a 23 mL Teflon-lined autoclave. After cooling to room temperature slowly, rod crystals of 1 were collected with a yield of 63% based on H2dnpdc. Elem anal. Calcd for C72H50N12O28Co3: C, 50.63; H, 2.95; N, 9.84. Found: C, 50.84; H, 2.86; N, 9.89. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3074w, 1673m, 1611vs, 1532vs,1485w, 1399vs, 1346m, 1219w, 1006w, 913w, 812m, 707m. A similar procedure was followed to prepare compound 2, except that bipy was replaced by bpea (0.1 mmol, 0.019 g). After the reaction mixture was cooled to room temperature slowly, rod brown crystals of 2 were obtained. The product was always contaminated by uncharacterized phases that were difficult to remove. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3583b, 3073w, 1674m, 1611vs, 1532vs, 1486w, 1400vs, 1346m, 1219w, 1092w, 1066w, 911w, 856w, 813m, 707m.
